lyrics:
17 contributorslet me be your teddy bear lyricsverse 1
baby let me be your loving teddy bear
put a chain around my neck
and lead me anywhere
oh let me be oh let him be
your teddy bear

i dont wanna to be a tiger
because tigers play too rough
i dont wanna be a lion
cause lions aint the kind you love enough

your teddy bear
